Lionel Messi's leg muscle injury will be evaluated "week by week," Inter Miami boss Gerardo "Tata" Martino said after the Argentine star sat out Saturday's win at D.C. United.

articles.title: Lakshya Sen’s run at All England Open ends after three-game semis defeat: ‘I know one thing that I must improve’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Too many long matches take a toll on young Lakshya Sen in three-game defeat to Indonesian Jonatan Christie
articles.content: Taking the scenic route to a destination is not the worst of things. The journey can be beautiful. But in sports, sometimes, it can prove costly. Lakshya Sen would know that all too well after his ex… [+4791 chars]
